description: "The Ethics of Print: Hans Christian Andersen, SÃ¸ren Kierkegaard, and the Danish Golden Age" will explore the literary polemics of the period (ca. 1800-1850) involving the two figures named in the title. The course fulfills Ethical Issues and Normative Perspectives (EIN), Ethical Reasoning in Context (ERC), and Writing in Context (WRI), and it counts towards the Philosophy and Norwegian majors, and the Nordic Studies concentration.
